title: Apply Today for Your New 2 Bedroom Apartment Home!
housing_type: application fee details: Head of household $17.15 & Other adults $11.65
posting_body: > Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!
If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.
Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.
Discover your new home at Stoneridge!
Conveniently located in the heart of Pflugerville, our community offers numerous dining, shopping, and entertainment options right outside of your front door.
Plus - we're just a short 30 minute drive Downtown Austin & Austin-Bergstrom International Airport!
Offering a variety of spacious 2, 3 & 4 bedroom apartment homes, we’re the expert at combining quality and comfort, making Stoneridge an ideal place to call home.

Every feature is designed with you in mind, from the outdoor swimming pool and playground area to the on-site fitness center and free community-wide + in-home Wi-Fi, we have made certain that there is something for everyone.
It is our pleasure to provide the everyday comforts and benefits that allow our residents to turn their apartments truly into homes.
Look no further, your new home is waiting for you at Stoneridge Apartments!
- Patio or Balcony with Attached Storage Room
*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.
Stoneridge participates in an affordable housing program.
Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $47,700 | 2 Occupants: $54,480 | 3
To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.
Make the move today by giving our professional staff a call:
